str2: Wherefore, on which account, therefore. From dia and hos; through which thing, i.e. Consequently.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To expect, wait for, await, think, anticipate. From pros and dokeuo; to anticipate; by implication, to await.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To hasten, be eager, be zealous. From spoude; to use speed, i.e. To make effort, be prompt or earnest.
A prolonged form of a primary heuro, which heureo is used for it in all the tenses except the present and imperfect to find.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Probably from a primary verb eiro; peace; by implication, prosperity.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Without blame or fault, unblemished. Unblamable.
